issue.title: [Python] Test case hard-codes endian information
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14685](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14685). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current test case causes a failure on big-endian platform since the endian information `>` is hard-coded.

`FAILED pyarrow/tests/test_pandas.py::test_timestamp_as_object_out_of_range - AssertionError: assert (dtype('O'), dtype('>M8[ns]')) == (dtype('O'), dtype('<M8[ns]'))`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14685?focusedCommentId=17444374) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11686
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11686>
